Product Views¶

class products.views.ProductViewSet(**kwargs)[source]¶

API endpoint that allows all products to be viewed or edited by admins. Allow view available products for normal users

get_permissions()[source]¶

Instantiates and returns the list of permissions that this view requires.

serializer_class¶

alias of products.serializers.ProductSerializer
